title: I am on the hunt for a new job.
body:
I don't make enough at my current job, I have an anticipated increase in living expenses coming up in April, and I will have my BBA in Finance in June. I am gettin a head start trying to get into a good career.

What is the point of this thread?

I just want some random advice from GD in terms of interviewing, expectations, and maybe some words of encouragement because fuck, this is stressful.

Also my increased living expenses will be my first child and then a home/apartment. All within the next couple months.
